p: Samples were denatured using SDS-PAGE sample buffer with or without DTT and heated for 7–10 min at 95°C. Generally, samples containing 2.5–3 µg of total protein were loaded onto 4–12% or 12% Bis-Tris NuPAGENovex Gels (Life Technologies). Gels were stained with GelCode Blue Stain Reagent (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, Massachusetts) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
